m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- On 14th March 2014 Uber announced that effective immediately they would provide$50k/$100k/$25k of coverage during period 1. When it becomes effective in July 2015, AB 2293 will require a minimum $50k/$100k/$30k of insurance coverage in period 1, while periods 2 and 3 remain at the $1m limit requirement. Further, the TNC coverage is to be primary.  May 7, 2016 at 5:26 am  textArticle -------------------- Pages Navigation Menu  Home  Services  Underwriting and Agency Management  Policy and claim systems  Pricing and analytics  Insurance product design  Affiliates  K
